abstract: Roy Read was told he wasn't Aboriginal
description: Documentary about Roy Read who was raised an orphan and told he wasn't Aboriginal - just "darker than others". At Kinchela Boys' Home he was subjected to the horrors of institutionalised life. Now 49 years later, he returns to face the demons of his past - and reconnect with the family he never knew he had. Contains archival b&w stills
